rooms.description: A welcoming entry area that adheres to Vastu principles, ensuring a smooth flow of energy. Decorative elements and traditional Kerala motifs enhance the space.

An open-plan living area merging with the kitchen, featuring large windows to ensure natural light as per Vastu guidelines. Traditional Kerala architectural elements such as tiled roofing and wooden carvings are incorporated.
An open-plan kitchen that is integrated with the living area, offering functional layout and ample ventilation. Vastu principles suggest the placement to avoid negative energy flow.
A dining space adjacent to the kitchen and living area for convenience during meals. The design includes provisions for both formal and informal gatherings in a Kerala-style setting.
A compact but comfortable space allocated for servant's quarters, ensuring privacy while maintaining proximity to the main living area. Vastu guidelines are considered in its orientation.
A designated storage space that adheres to functionality and efficient use of space within traditional Kerala design frameworks.

openings.description: A traditional wooden door providing security and aesthetic appeal as per Kerala style with Vastu-aligned orientation.
Large windows in the living area and kitchen to maximize natural light and ensure proper air circulation as recommended by Vastu.
A traditional Kerala-style balcony offering outdoor space and enhancing ventilation. The design respects the regional architectural norms.

rooms.description: Primary bedroom with ample natural light and Vastu-aligned orientation for restful sleep. Incorporates traditional Kerala design elements.
Secondary bedroom designed to be quiet and serene with Vastu principles in mind. Features typical Kerala architectural styling.
A well-equipped bathroom for personal use attached to the master bedroom ensuring privacy and ease of access.
A dedicated private gym area with adequate ventilation and natural light. Designed in a Kerala aesthetic manner while maintaining modern fitness requirements.

openings.description: Window placements optimized for natural light and energy flow as per Vastu.
A balcony overlooking the garden space to enhance relaxation in accordance with Kerala traditions and Vastu principles.
